item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, November 19, 2024 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: A ready-to-adapt email marketing sequences database (9 points | 4 comments)
2. $8k Suzuki from India received a 5-star crash test rating (259 points | 222 comments)
3. Launch HN: Regatta Storage (YC F24) – Turn S3 into a local-like, POSIX cloud FS (453 points | 239 comments)
4. Magic Circle tries to track down first female member – who posed as a man (13 points | 12 comments)
5. Maslow 4: Large format CNC routing made accessible (145 points | 36 comments)
6. Rim/Blackberry tales – reply all (29 points | 8 comments)
7. Expand.ai (YC S24) Is Hiring a Founding Engineer to Turn the Web into an API ( | hide)
8. Show HN: FastGraphRAG – Better RAG using good old PageRank (333 points | 83 comments)
9. Building Observability with ClickHouse (47 points | 13 comments)
10. Listen to what gets lost when an MP3 is made (2015) (61 points | 29 comments)
11. 20 years of Google Scholar (313 points | 142 comments)
12. Scientific American's departing editor and the politicization of science (137 points | 155 comments)
13. Two undersea cables in Baltic Sea disrupted (320 points | 566 comments)
14. Hyperfine: A command-line benchmarking tool (143 points | 19 comments)
15. MailCatcher runs a super simple SMTP server (238 points | 72 comments)
16. New textbook teaches students about matrix methods and their real world apps (58 points | 22 comments)
17. DOJ will push Google to sell off Chrome (661 points | 790 comments)
18. Llama 3.1 405B now runs at 969 tokens/s on Cerebras Inference (398 points | 126 comments)
19. Sequin: A powerful little tool for inspecting ANSI escape sequences (62 points | 20 comments)
20. Batched reward model inference and Best-of-N sampling (17 points | discuss)
21. Museum of Bad Art (175 points | 127 comments)
22. A BBC navigation bar component broke depending on the external monitor (257 points | 108 comments)
23. The tragedy of running an old Node project (126 points | 162 comments)
24. Hyrumtoken: A Go package to encrypt pagination tokens (59 points | 38 comments)
25. Air traffic failure caused by two locations 3600nm apart sharing 3-letter code (226 points | 233 comments)
26. Hong Kong Jails Benny Tai for 10 Years in Longest Security Law Sentence (28 points | 5 comments)
27. PyTorch 101: Understanding Graphs, Automatic Differentiation and Autograd (44 points | 2 comments)
28. Show HN: Dumbo – Hono inspired framework for PHP (56 points | 49 comments)
29. The Skyline algorithm for packing 2D rectangles (192 points | 44 comments)
30. Iumenta: A generic framework for animal digital twins (16 points | 5 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, November 19, 2024 at 12:30 PM UTC
